headline: What General Electric (GE)'s New Dividend and MRO Spending Plan Means For Shareholders
summary: GE Aerospace’s board has declared a US$0.36 per share dividend on its common stock, payable on January 26, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on December 29, 2025, with the ex-dividend date also set for December 29, 2025. This dividend decision comes shortly after GE outlined a major capital expenditure program for European MRO facilities, highlighting management’s confidence in cash generation while it commits substantial funds to long-term efficiency and service...
